description:
The first Pokepark game featuring 3D Gameplay controlling Pokemon.
Lot of Minigames in the mission to save the Pokepark through the collection of Prism Shards.

0.0.0.description:
- reworked generation
- added default options
- dynamic item classification
- added icon
- added rule for Delibird
- fixed kirlia location rule
- fixed attraction client data
- updated flygon rule
- added missing magikarp unlock

0.2.2.title: 0.2.2 [JP]

0.2.3.description:
## What's Changed

- reworked Mew
 - made postgame locations now always available
 - improved location checks
 - skygarden Unlock now freely available
 - added additional postgame Prisma locations
- fixed Blaziken Friendship Bug and updated logic
- Corphish and Krabby Unlock stabilized
- Postgame Pokemon always in Minigame available
- fixed 0.6.2 incompability


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Mekurushi/Archipelago_Pokepark/compare/0.2.2...0.2.3

0.2.3-hotfix.title: 0.2.3-hotfix [JP]

1.0.0.description:
## Highlights
- **Full ISO compatibility:** Any PokePark ISO (PAL, NA, JP) should now be supported.

## New Features:
- Added support for all ISO versions and languages (PAL, NA, JP)
- Added **Harder Enemy AI** option
- Added Each Zone option
- Added **Legendary Pokemon Power Competition** locations
- Added **Attraction Entrance Randomizer**
- Added new locations
- Added dynamic item classification
- Improved generation rules

## Fixes & Improvements
- Fixed various bugs and inconsistencies
- Improved Stability
- improved patching stability

## Roadmap
Future updates will focus on **quality-of-life improvements**, **stability**, and further **feature expansion**.  
Some planned features include:

- In-game client messages  
- In-game hint system  
- Full entrance randomization  
- Model customization 

## Setup
For installation and usage instructions, please refer to the [Setup](https://github.com/Mekurushi/Archipelago_Pokepark/blob/35b6ae1c4974e59ea08e9949ecd98a733a923cea/worlds/pokepark/docs/setup_en.md).

1.0.4.description:
## What's Changed
* added check for outdated UT version by @Mekurushi in https://github.com/Mekurushi/Archipelago_Pokepark/pull/42
* removed Rotom Prisma Requirement for Mansion Abra by @Mekurushi in https://github.com/Mekurushi/Archipelago_Pokepark/pull/46
* reclassified Electrode Power Comp as Misc by @Mekurushi in https://github.com/Mekurushi/Archipelago_Pokepark/pull/47
* updated Electivire rule and updated client for stage names by @Mekurushi in https://github.com/Mekurushi/Archipelago_Pokepark/pull/49
* updated docs and option descriptions by @Mekurushi in https://github.com/Mekurushi/Archipelago_Pokepark/pull/51


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Mekurushi/Archipelago_Pokepark/compare/1.0.3...1.0.4

1.1.0.description:
## What's Changed
* pokepark entrance logic update and randomizator by @Mekurushi in https://github.com/Mekurushi/Archipelago_Pokepark/pull/55
* UT yaml-less support with seed in slot_data by @Mekurushi in https://github.com/Mekurushi/Archipelago_Pokepark/pull/56
* renamed locations with more context by @Mekurushi in https://github.com/Mekurushi/Archipelago_Pokepark/pull/57
* added fast travel taxi stop option by @Mekurushi in https://github.com/Mekurushi/Archipelago_Pokepark/pull/58
* pokepark death link prototype by @Mekurushi in https://github.com/Mekurushi/Archipelago_Pokepark/pull/61


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Mekurushi/Archipelago_Pokepark/compare/1.0.5...1.1.0
